data: Wayne N. Polyzou Wayne N. Polyzou polyzou@uiowa.edu Ph.D., University of Maryland, 1979 306 VAN (319) 335-1856 http://homepage.physics.uiowa.edu/~wpolyzou/phys4762/ Theoretical nuclear physics; mathematical physics. # Current Research: Supported by NSF and DOE Office of Science Relativistic few-quark and few-nucleon models of light nuclei and nucleons Leptonic probes of few hadron systems Scattering using Minkowski path integrals Multi-scale wavelet representations of quantum fields The vacuum in quantum field theory Euclidean formulations of relativistic quantum mechanics and quantum field theory Numerical methods based on wavelets
